attributes.description: Sleek Head Turning Design With Beast Like Performance Makes This Luxury SUV Much In Demand. Our 2014 Model Is Presented In White With A Black Leather Interior And Black Interior Trim. It Has Covered 158 000 km And Retains A Full Service History. Features Include A Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, BMW Adaptive LED Lights, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Electric Seats With Memory, Satellite Navigation, Bluetooth, USB And Auxiliary Input, Preparation For BMW Connected Services, Climate Control, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Electric Tailgate And 20 Inch Alloy Wheels. This Fully Specced Sporty SUV Can Be Yours Today. Come And View Now! Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.

attributes.description:
As a first of its kind, with over three decades of constant improvement in design and performance, the Vitara name has blazed the way forward for compact SUVs. Now, four generations later, the all-new Vitara Brezza defies all the odds and continues to deliver on the exceptional.

 

The Vitara Brezza’s contemporary design pays homage to the Vitara’s Compact SUV heritage. The brawny exterior is adorned with a touch of modern pizzazz. The Vitara Brezza’s 1.5l  engine is perfectly coupled with a premium and sporty luxury-fitted cabin to make sure your drive isn’t just good, it is the best.
